title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Information Literacy-Based Mathematics for General Citizens Aged 40+

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in fundamental digital device usage and middle school-level foundational mathematics
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify and evaluate reliable mathematics-related information across diverse digital platforms.
Learners can systematically collect information necessary for mathematical problem-solving using smartphone applications.
Learners can apply mathematical approaches to real-life problems (e.g., budget management, statistical interpretation) based on collected information.
Learners can share mathematical problem-solving strategies and provide peer feedback using online collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
